C_Cpp.clang_format_style: { BasedOnStyle: Google, IndentWidth: 2, UseTab: Always, AlignAfterOpenBracket: Align, AllowShortIfStatementsOnASingleLine: false, IndentCaseLabels: false, DerivePointerAlignment: false, PointerAlignment: Left, BinPackArguments: false, BinPackParameters: false, AllowAllParametersOfDeclarationOnNextLine: false, ExperimentalAutoDetectBinPacking: false }
